snippet: Mr. Day-Lewis, the Oscar-winning star of "There Will Be Blood" and "Lincoln," will be among the 180 new members inducted into the American Academy of Arts and Sciences at a ceremony on Saturday.
abstract: Mr. Day-Lewis, the Oscar-winning star of "There Will Be Blood" and "Lincoln," will be among the 180 new members inducted into the American Academy of Arts and Sciences at a ceremony on Saturday.

headline.main: A Belated Inauguration for Daniel Day-Lewis
headline.print_headline: A Belated Inauguration For Daniel Day-Lewis
